name: DailyBibleInspiration
0:
”Alexa, open daily bible inspiration”
”Alexa, start daily bible inspiration”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily bible inspiration
des:
Start your day with an inspirational list of bible verses. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
